text: (nabiye!) ahashi sitinnanda, bhumiyehi sitinnanda, suryayada, candrayada, tarukada, kanduda, gasda, satunda, minisungen bohomayak denada niyata vasayenma allahta sujud kara, namadinnaha yanna oba nodækkehida? ehet vædideneku mata danduvamama niyama viya. kavurunva allah avaman karanneda, ohuva kisiveku visin ho gaurava kala nohæka. niyata vasayenma allah taman adahas karana dæyama karanneya
